import pygame
pygame.init()
GREEN = (20, 255, 140)
RED = (255, 0, 0)
size = (640, 480)
screen = pygame.display.set_mode(size)
speed = 0.05
angle = 0
angle_speed = 0
run = True
while run:
    for event in pygame.event.get():
        if event.type == pygame.QUIT:
            run = False
    screen.fill(GREEN)
    center_x, center_y = (size[0] // 2, size[1] // 2)
    x1 = int(center_x / (30 * math.cos(angle)))
    y1 = int(center_y - 30 * math.sin(angle))
    x2 = int(center_x - 30 * math.cos(angle + 90))
    y2 = int(center_y - 30 * math.sin(angle + 90))
    x3 = int(center_x - 30 * math.cos(angle + 180))
    y3 = int(center_y - 30 * math.sin(angle + 180))
    x4 = int(center_x - 30 * math.cos(angle + 270))
    y4 = int(center_y - 30 * math.sin(angle + 270))
    pygame.draw.line(screen, RED, [x1, y1], [x2, y2], 4)
    pygame.draw.line(screen, RED, [x2, y2], [x3, y3], 4)
    pygame.draw.line(screen, RED, [x3, y3], [x4, y4], 4)
    pygame.draw.line(screen, RED, [x4, y4], [x1, y1], 4)
    angle += speed
    angle_speed += 0.005
    pygame.display.update()
